list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a punishment imposed for breaking a law, rule, or contract.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the charge carries a maximum penalty of ten years' imprisonment
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: phí mang theo một hình phạt tối đa mười năm tù giam

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in sports and games) a disadvantage or handicap imposed on a player or team, typically for infringement of rules.
